content: knitted unicorn mittens for children in drops merino extra fine pattern me-69-bn yarn group b see the rainbow unicorn set neck warmer pattern here 1 see the rainbow unicorn set hat pattern here 2 see the rainbow the unicorn soft toy pattern here 3 **size** 1 - 6 years 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 - 5/6 years **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 50-50-50 g colour 25 pink 50 50-50-50 g colour 17 cerise 50 50-50-50 g colour 30 mustard 50 50-50-50 g colour 19 light grey blue some left over grey for eyes **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles ** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm - for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 mm for rib 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s37-16-b-rainbow-unicorn-set-neck-warmer 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s37-16-a-rainbow-unicorn-set-hat 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s37-18-rainbow-the-unicorn
